thread.title: Clean Bill of Health for Insurance Deals

author: Charley Grant
title: Clean Bill of Health for Insurance Deals

organizations.name: clean bill of health for insurance deals small

text:
Small health insurers have every incentive to get bigger.
That is the takeaway from Tuesdayâ€™s announcement that WellCare Health Plans plans to buy privately held insurer Meridian for $2.5 billion. Like WellCare, Meridian specializes in government-sourced business such as Medicaid and Medicare Advantage.
WellCare is certainly paying up for...
